subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Madison Square Garden
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: In March 1950, City College of New York became the first and last team to win both the National Invitation Tournament and the N.C.A.A. championship.
snippet: In March 1950, City College of New York became the first and last team to win both the National Invitation Tournament and the N.C.A.A. championship.
